Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Jackson
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Jackson due to a sick customer.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Jackson due to a sick customer. 

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
